introduction: Answer questions about yourself, eg your income and savings, to work out how much Pension Credit you may be entitled to.
more_information:
It will give you an idea of how much Pension Credit you could get.

You **can't** use this calculator if:

- you live in a care home - contact the Pension Credit application line on 0800 99 1234
- you or your partner are deferring your State Pension - contact your pension centre on 0845 60 60 265

If you've not reached the [Pension Credit qualifying age](http://pensions-service.direct.gov.uk/en/state-pension-age-calculator/home.asp "Pension Credit qualifying age"){:rel="external"}, enter '1 January 1950' as your date of birth on step 2 of the calculator.

^ The amount of Pension Credit you'll get will depend on your circumstances when you reach the qualifying age ^
overview: Get an estimate of how much Pension Credit you may be entitled to
title: Pension Credit calculator
